meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> came in and buried your <radical>flag</radical> so now you have to use a <radical>spoon</radical> and dig it out of the <kanji>mud</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You may know of Dora the Explorer. But have you heard about her dirty, <kanji>mud</kanji>dy brother, <reading>Doro</reading> (<ja>どろ</ja>)? They're like a team. And because of all the exploring he does, Doro is always covered in mud.
